programme.desc: Ζήσε όλη τη δράση από το φετινό EKO Ράλλυ Ακρόπολις.

programme.title: WRC EKO Ράλλυ Ακρόπολις 2023
programme.desc: SS1 Super Special Stage. Ζήσε ξανά όλη τη δράση από το φετινό EKO Ράλλυ Ακρόπολις, που διεξήχθη με απόλυτη επιτυχία στη χώρα μας από τις 7 έως τις 10 Σεπτεμβρίου. Περιγραφή: Γιάννης Μάριος Παπαδόπουλος.

programme.title: Acropolis Rally Show 2024
programme.desc: Μια εκπομπή αφιερωμένη στο 'Ράλλυ των Θεών', που φέτος επιστρέφει στην Ελλάδα και στο πρόγραμμα του WRC.

programme.title: ERC 2024
programme.desc: Με χρονιά εκκίνησης το 1953, το Ευρωπαϊκό Πρωτάθλημα Ράλι της FIA γίνεται 72 ετών το 2024 με ένα πρόγραμμα γύρων που διεξάγεται σε άσφαλτο και χαλίκι. Πρόκειται για το απόλυτο πεδίο προπόνησης για τα νέα ταλέντα που στοχεύουν στην κορυφή του αθλήματος. Περιγραφή: Χρήστος Βασιλείου.

programme.title: WRC EKO Ράλλυ Ακρόπολις 2024 Μαγκαζίνο
programme.desc: Ζήσε όλη τη δράση από το φετινό EKO Ράλλυ Ακρόπολις.

programme.title: EKO Acropolis Rally 2022
programme.desc: Στιγμιότυπα Διοργάνωσης. Από τις 8-11 Σεπτεμβρίου 2022, το Ράλι Ακρόπολις χάρισε αξέχαστες στιγμές στους φίλους του μηχανονοκίνητου αθλητισμού. Παρακολουθήστε τις καλύτερες στιγμές της διοργάνωσης.

programme.title: WRC 2023 - Στιγμιότυπα
programme.desc: EKO Ράλλυ Ακρόπολις, Ανασκόπηση Αγώνα. Μια σύντομη ματιά στη δράση του Παγκοσμίου Πρωταθλήματος ράλι. Οι καλύτερες στιγμές από τα δοκιμαστικά, την προθέρμανση, τους αγώνες και τις απονομές έρχονται στις οθόνες σας.

programme.title: WRC EKO Ράλλυ Ακρόπολις 2024 Μαγκαζίνο
programme.desc: Ζήσε όλη τη δράση από το φετινό EKO Ράλλυ Ακρόπολις.

programme.title: WRC EKO Ράλλυ Ακρόπολις 2024
programme.desc: Ζήσε όλη τη δράση από το φετινό EKO Ράλλυ Ακρόπολις, που διεξάγεται από τις 5 έως τις 8 Σεπτεμβρίου. Περιγραφή: Γιάννης Μάριος Παπαδόπουλος.

programme.title: WRC Acropolis Rally Legends
programme.desc: Παρακολουθήστε συνεντεύξεις και αφιερώματα σε 'θρύλους' του Ράλλυ Ακρόπολις.

programme.title: WRC 2024
programme.desc: Παρακολουθήστε το Παγκόσμιο Πρωτάθλημα ράλι του 2024.

programme.title: Motorsports: Moto3 2024
programme.desc: Gran Premio GoPro de Aragon - Αγώνας. Το Παγκόσμιο Πρωτάθλημα FIM Moto3 2024 περιλαμβάνει 15 ομάδες από 5 κατασκευαστές και συνολικά 28 αναβάτες. Ο νικητής κρίνεται από 21 Γκραν Πρι που διεξάγονται μεταξύ 10ης Μαρτίου και 17ης Νοεμβρίου. Περιγραφή: Θανάσης Κελάφης.

programme.title: Motorsports: Moto2 2024
programme.desc: Το Παγκόσμιο Πρωτάθλημα FIM Moto2 2024 περιλαμβάνει 15 ομάδες από 3 κατασκευαστές και συνολικά 30 αναβάτες. Ο τελικός νικητής θα κριθεί μέσα από 21 συναρπαστικά Γκραν Πρι. Περιγραφή: Θανάσης Κελάφης.

programme.title: Motorsports: MotoGP 2024
programme.desc: Το Παγκόσμιο Πρωτάθλημα FIM MotoGP 2024 περιλαμβάνει 11 ομάδες από 5 κατασκευαστές. Συνολικά 22 αναβάτες διεκδικούν τον τίτλο μέσα από 22 Γκραν Πρι, τα οποία διεξάγονται από 10 Μαρτίου έως 17 Νοεμβρίου. Περιγραφή: Δημήτρης Διατσίδης.

programme.title: WRC 2024
programme.desc: Παρακολουθήστε το Παγκόσμιο Πρωτάθλημα ράλι του 2024.

programme.title: MotoGP 2024 - Στιγμιότυπα
programme.desc: Το MotoGP, το παγκόσμιο πρωτάθλημα μοτοσυκλέτας, προσφέρει πολλές συγκινήσεις. Παρακολουθήστε μια συμπυκνωμένη εκδοχή όσων συνέβησαν σε μια από τις κούρσες του 2024.

programme.title: Sports Classics: Gearing Up 2024
programme.desc: Συναρπαστικοί αγώνες από τις πιο απαιτητικές διοργανώσεις. Βραχώδη εδάφη, βαθιά ποτάμια, εξαντλητικοί αγώνες στην έρημο, κόντρες σε χωματόδρομους και αγώνες ταχύτητα στην άσφαλτο. Απολαύστε όλα αυτά σε μια σειρά γεμάτη δράση.

programme.title: Live: SportsCenter With Scott Van Pelt
programme.desc: SVP's up at midnight and bringing his unique perspective on games people play to "SportsCenter" viewers. The hourlong, late-night show is driven by the host's self-deprecating wit and passion for sports, with featured elements, including Van Pelt's nightly "1 Big Thing" commentary and a weekly look back at the moments that drove bettors wild in "Bad Beats." The show also delivers what "SportsCenter" fans are used to -- news and highlights, guests and interviews -- but in a different, fast-paced and insightful way.

programme.title: Live: SportsCenter With Scott Van Pelt

programme.title: Live: SportsCenter
programme.desc: The latest news, highlights and inside information from every corner of the sports world is presented each day on "SportsCenter," ESPN's first-ever program when the network debuted in September of 1979. The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new midnight show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-driven reports and what's new on social media platforms.

programme.title: Live: Get Up
programme.desc: ESPN's morning show features host Mike Greenberg with a rotating and diverse group of analysts opining about and analyzing the latest news from the world of sports. The two-hour, personality-driven show originates from Manhattan's South Street Seaport, a locale that attracts high-profile guests. Greenberg, aka "Greeny," is formerly one-half of ESPN Radio's longtime "Mike & Mike" morning show.

programme.title: Live: First Take
programme.desc: Stephen A. Smith joins host Molly Qerim on this weekday morning sports debate show. Smith provides his expert takes on the day's trending sports topics and under-the-radar news. They're regularly joined by veteran analysts and the top guests in sports and entertainment.

programme.title: Live: The Pat McAfee Show
programme.desc: Former NFL punter Pat McAfee brings his humor and candor to the microphone to highlight the day's top stories.

programme.title: Live: SportsCenter

programme.title: Live: NBA Today
programme.desc: In-depth, comprehensive daily coverage of all aspects of the NBA from expert analysts.

programme.title: Live: NFL Live
programme.desc: Host Laura Rutledge takes the helm of this weekday show featuring the likes of Marcus Spears, Dan Orlovsky, Mina Kimes, and Adam Schefter. The "NFL Live" crew entertains fans while offering all the latest news and analysis from across the NFL.

programme.title: Around the Horn
programme.desc: Hosted by Tony Reali in the ESPN studio and joined via satellite by four panelists from across the country, the team debates popular sports stories. Reali acts as moderator, giving points for well-made arguments and deducting points for those who inspire him to hit the "mute" button. At the end of the show, whomever Reali deems the winner has 30 seconds without interruption to voice their final opinions on any topic they want.

programme.title: Live: Pardon the Interruption
programme.desc: The debate is the story in this fast-paced, half-hour series hosted by former Washington Post sportswriters Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon. The pair engage in high-energy discussions, conduct interviews and often argue over topics not even related to sports. Other sports reporters appear as guests and offer opinions on the top stories of the day.

programme.desc: When a bored student at the Magic School accidentally conjures up Lady Godiva and Lord Dyson, the Charmed Ones must keep Dyson from killing Lady Godiva before she can go back in time and complete her famous ride.

programme.title: Back to the Future Part III
programme.desc: In this final chapter, Marty McFly (Michael J. Fox) obtains a 70-year-old message from the time-traveling Dr. Emmett Brown (Christopher Lloyd), in which he informs Marty that he has retired to a small town in the Old West. Marty then finds out that the Doc was murdered shortly after sending the letter. In order to save his friend, Marty will have to travel back in time, disentangle a lovestruck Doc from a local schoolmarm, and repair the DeLorean -- all while avoiding a posse of gunslingers.

programme.title: Back to the Future Part II
programme.desc: In this zany sequel, time-traveling duo Marty McFly (Michael J. Fox) and Dr. Emmett Brown (Christopher Lloyd) return from saving Marty's future son from disaster, only to discover their own time transformed. In this nightmarish version of Hill Valley, Marty's father has been murdered and Biff Tannen, Marty's nemesis, has profited. After uncovering the secret to Biff's success -- a sports almanac from the future -- Marty and the Doc embark on a quest to repair the space-time continuum.

programme.title: Back to the Future
programme.desc: In this 1980s sci-fi classic, small-town California teen Marty McFly (Michael J. Fox) is thrown back into the '50s when an experiment by his eccentric scientist friend Doc Brown (Christopher Lloyd) goes awry. Traveling through time in a modified DeLorean car, Marty encounters young versions of his parents (Crispin Glover, Lea Thompson), and must make sure that they fall in love or he'll cease to exist. Even more dauntingly, Marty has to return to his own time and save the life of Doc Brown.

programme.title: Back to the Future Part II
programme.desc: In this zany sequel, time-traveling duo Marty McFly (Michael J. Fox) and Dr. Emmett Brown (Christopher Lloyd) return from saving Marty's future son from disaster, only to discover their own time transformed. In this nightmarish version of Hill Valley, Marty's father has been murdered and Biff Tannen, Marty's nemesis, has profited. After uncovering the secret to Biff's success -- a sports almanac from the future -- Marty and the Doc embark on a quest to repair the space-time continuum.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: A petty officer is murdered while in town to help a refugee family; Wade works on the special election campaign for Mayor Zahra Taylor that takes place during Mardi Gras.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: FBI Special Agent Raymond Isler asks Pride for help with an off-the-books opioids theft investigation he is personally invested in; Percy works under cover as a getaway driver, with Isler as the muscle for a job tied to the case.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: A congressional aide disappears after a hit man saves her from two men posing as NCIS agents; LaSalle struggles with life-altering decisions regarding his brother's future.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The team investigates the murder of a Navy captain who was searching for a priceless 200-year-old fleur-de-lis during the annual Louisiana Pirate Festival.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Percy and Lasalle go under cover at a high-stakes poker game after the organizer targets players with access to a naval research laboratory; Laurel Pride visits her dad during spring break to discuss options after her upcoming graduation.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Grams puts a spell on the brothers to end their rivalry, but the spell turns the Charmed Ones into bickering teens; Leo consults a demonic seer (Charisma Carpenter) to find out who is behind the attack on Wyatt.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: A demon tries to destroy his human half by killing his remaining blood relatives, so Paige casts a spell that inadvertently blocks all death from occurring, angering the Angel of Death (Simon Templeman).

programme.title: Terminator: Dark Fate
programme.desc: In Mexico City, a newly modified liquid Terminator -- the Rev-9 model -- arrives from the future to kill a young factory worker named Dani Ramos. Also sent back in time is Grace, a hybrid cyborg human who must protect Ramos from the seemingly indestructible robotic assassin. But the two women soon find some much-needed help from a pair of unexpected allies -- seasoned warrior Sarah Connor and the T-800 Terminator.

programme.title: Star Wars: The Phantom Menace
programme.desc: Obi-Wan Kenobi (Ewan McGregor) is a young apprentice Jedi knight under the tutelage of Qui-Gon Jinn (Liam Neeson) ; Anakin Skywalker (Jake Lloyd), who will later father Luke Skywalker and become known as Darth Vader, is just a 9-year-old boy. When the Trade Federation cuts off all routes to the planet Naboo, Qui-Gon and Obi-Wan are assigned to settle the matter.

programme.title: Star Wars: Attack of the Clones
programme.desc: Set ten years after the events of "The Phantom Menace," the Republic continues to be mired in strife and chaos. A separatist movement encompassing hundreds of planets and powerful corporate alliances poses new threats to the galaxy that even the Jedi cannot stem. These moves, long planned by an as yet unrevealed and powerful force, lead to the beginning of the Clone Wars -- and the beginning of the end of the Republic.

programme.title: Star Wars: Revenge of the Sith
programme.desc: It has been three years since the Clone Wars began. Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi (Ewan McGregor) and Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker (Hayden Christensen) rescue Chancellor Palpatine (Ian McDiarmid) from General Grievous, the commander of the droid armies, but Grievous escapes. Suspicions are raised within the Jedi Council concerning Chancellor Palpatine, with whom Anakin has formed a bond. Asked to spy on the chancellor, and full of bitterness toward the Jedi Council, Anakin embraces the Dark Side.

programme.desc: Pratite auto magazin "Car fashion" i saznajte sve o najnovijim trendovima iz automobilske industrije.

programme.title: Pregled portugalske lige
programme.desc: Osnovana 1934. kao probni projekat, portugalska liga je četiri godine kasnije dobila i svoju službenu verziju nazvanu Primeira. U današnjem sistemu liga broji 18 ekipa gde svaka ekipa igra po jednu...

programme.title: Američki koledž fudbal: Florida State - Boston College
programme.desc: Koledž fudbal je američki fudbal koji igraju timovi sportista-studenata u okviru američkih koledža, univerziteta i vojnih akademija. Univerzitetski fudbal je jedna stepenica niže u odnosu na...

programme.title: Košarka - Prijateljska utakmica (M): Lokomotiv Kuban - Uralmash Ekaterinburg
programme.desc: U periodima između takmičarskih sezona, pripremni period klubovi upotpunjuju odigravanjem prijateljskih utakmica.

programme.title: Atletika: Dijamantska liga - Rome
programme.desc: Pratite novo izdanje Dijamantske lige, zemlja domaćin je Italija, a mesto održavanja je Rim.

programme.title: Legende o Legendama
programme.desc: Zanimljiv koncept, sportske legende pričaju o svojim dostignućima, strahovima, usponima i padovima. Uživaćete u ovom serijalu.

programme.title: Pregled holandske lige
programme.desc: Očekuje se trka Ajaksa i PSV-a za titulu. Može li Fejenord da im se priključi ili će AZ Alkmar napasti iz senke?

programme.desc: Bliži se Svetsko prvenstvo i sve je manje prostora za grešku u kvalifikacijama. Mi smo na svim kontinentima i pratimo sva dešavanja. (LIVE).

programme.title: Pregled turske lige

programme.title: Fudbal - Bundesliga: Werder - Dortmund
programme.desc: Fudbalska Bundesliga najviši je rang takmičenje u Nemačkoj koja od 1963. godine i svog osnutka visokom kvalitetom igre oduševljava sve fudbalske poklonike širom sveta.

programme.desc: U periodima između takmičarskih sezona, pripremni period klubovi upotpunjuju odigravanjem prijateljskih utakmica. (LIVE).

programme.desc: Pratite prenos godišnjeg atletskog događaja koji se održava na stadionu Letzigrund u Cirihu kao finale Dijamantske lige. (LIVE).

programme.title: Track & Field
programme.desc: "Track & Field" jedan je od najcenjenijih atletskih magazina koji pokriva sva najzanimljivija atletska svetska takmičenja, preko američkih studentskih takmičenja do Olimpijskih igara.

programme.title: Zlatni golovi YU sporta

programme.title: Na današnji dan

programme.title: Euroleague Razglednice
programme.desc: Novinari Sport Kluba putuju sa Zvezdom i Partizanom na sve utakmice Evrolige, kao i na velike lokalne derbije i na Final Four. Iz svakog grada, u ono malo slobodno vremena, napravi se reportaža o...

programme.title: Fudbal - Kvalifikacije za SP (Azija): Australia - Bahrain
programme.desc: Bliži se Svetsko prvenstvo i sve je manje prostora za grešku u kvalifikacijama. Mi smo na svim kontinentima i pratimo sva dešavanja.

programme.title: Košarka: Sećanje na Dražena Petrovića

programme.title: Moto GP Misano: Moto GP: Trening 1
